description.0: The stave of this bow is comprised of metal alloy and yet remains surprisingly light. Even when faced with thick, heavy snares, the arrows it fires can pass through unhindered.

0.0: Upon causing an Elemental Reaction, increases Elemental Mastery by <cryo>60</cryo> for 12s. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Elemental Mastery from this effect is further increased by <cryo>60</cryo>. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is off-field.

1.0: Upon causing an Elemental Reaction, increases Elemental Mastery by <cryo>75</cryo> for 12s. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Elemental Mastery from this effect is further increased by <cryo>75</cryo>. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is off-field.

2.0: Upon causing an Elemental Reaction, increases Elemental Mastery by <cryo>90</cryo> for 12s. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Elemental Mastery from this effect is further increased by <cryo>90</cryo>. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is off-field.

3.0: Upon causing an Elemental Reaction, increases Elemental Mastery by <cryo>105</cryo> for 12s. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Elemental Mastery from this effect is further increased by <cryo>105</cryo>. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is off-field.

4.0: Upon causing an Elemental Reaction, increases Elemental Mastery by <cryo>120</cryo> for 12s. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Elemental Mastery from this effect is further increased by <cryo>120</cryo>. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is off-field.
